contents: (17) ________. People can use the Internet to access information from almost anywhere at almost any time. (18) <u>Increasingly taking the Internet with them wherever they go, are people.</u> The ubiquity of laptops, tablets, and smartphones with Internet connections suggests that people love having information at their fingertips. This availability of information has obvious benefits. (19) <u>It can help you find your way when you are lost, it can save you research time and effort, it can expose you to a variety of ideas from a range of sources, and it can help you stay connected with friends and family.</u> While the Internet changes many aspects of our lives for the better, could it also be changing another aspect of our lives without our awareness? Could the Internet be changing the way we think?
